messages.name: SET_PEDALS_RANGE
messages.description: Syncronization message from Steering Wheel to Pedals Control Unit. Message semantic: (start|end) set of (max|min) value for (accelerator|brake|all) pedal.

messages.name: ACCELERATOR_PEDAL_VAL
messages.description: Accelerator Pedal potentiometer Value. Average of 2 sensors normalized from 0 to 255, linear, 8bit total, unsigned.

messages.name: BRAKE_PEDAL_VAL
messages.description: Brake Pedal pressure sensor Value. Normalized from 0 to 255, linear, 8bit total, unsigned.

messages.name: PCU_STATUS
messages.description: Status of the PCU: contains impending warnings and active fatal errors. Warings could vanish but fatal errors do not reset, instead they additively increase.

messages.name: IMU_ANGULAR_RATE
messages.description: Inertial Measurement Unit [x,y,z]-axis angular rate value. 0.01dps per bit, Big-Endian, 16bit Total, signed

messages.name: IMU_ACCELERATION
messages.description: Inertial Measurement Unit [x,y,z]-axis acceleration value. 0.01g per bit, Big-Endian, 16bit Total, signed

messages.name: IRTS_FL_0
messages.description: Front Left wheel InfraRed Temperature Sensor data, channels 1 through 4. 0.1˚C per bit, -100˚C offset, Big-Endian, 16bit Total, unsigned.

messages.name: IRTS_FL_1
messages.description: Front Left wheel InfraRed Temperature Sensor data, channels 5 through 8. 0.1˚C per bit, -100˚C offset, Big-Endian, 16bit Total, unsigned.

messages.name: IRTS_FL_2
messages.description: Front Left wheel InfraRed Temperature Sensor data, channels 9 through 12. 0.1˚C per bit, -100˚C offset, Big-Endian, 16bit Total, unsigned.

messages.name: IRTS_FL_3
messages.description: Front Left wheel InfraRed Temperature Sensor data, channels 13 through 16. 0.1˚C per bit, -100˚C offset, Big-Endian, 16bit Total, unsigned.

messages.description: Front Right wheel InfraRed Temperature Sensor data, channels 13 through 16. 0.1˚C per bit, -100˚C offset, Big-Endian, 16bit Total, unsigned.
